isis.stitle: TSI 01-08-04 - Instrument Cluster Digital LCD Display on 4300 and 4400 Models

subjectgroup.subject: Instrument Cluster Digital LCD Display on 4300 and 4400 Models

geninfo.para: Resetting trip data and changing the vehicle odometer from miles to kilometers or vice versa.

svcproc.stitle: TSI 01-08-04 - Instrument Cluster Digital LCD Display on 4300 and 4400 Models
svcproc.title: Service Procedure

step1.para: Toggle through the LCD Display modes by momentarily pressing the instrument cluster Select/Reset button on the right lower side of the instrument cluster. The available display modes are Miles/KM, Hours (Hourmeter), MPG, Trip Miles/KM and Trip Hours.
Press and hold the Select/Reset button for 3-5 seconds while displaying Trip Miles/KM to reset Trip Miles/KM to zero.
Press and hold the Select/Reset button for 3-5 seconds while displaying Trip Hours to reset Trip Hours to zero.
Press and hold the Select/Reset button for 3-5 seconds while displaying Miles to switch to Kilometers and vice versa.

Permanent vehicle distance is stored in the engine ECM, not the instrument cluster. The instrument cluster will temporarily store and display the most recent vehicle distance, but will change to the distance stored in the ECM after traveling 0.1 mile. When performing the NETS programming process on an ECM, enter the distance displayed by the instrument cluster prior to driving the vehicle.
